content.rendered:
beauty bar in toronto beaches | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in the beaches, toronto. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up

Get Directions

Add Waypoint
show options hide options
Print directions Reset directions
Fetching directions......
Reset directions
Print directions
beauty bar in toronto beaches | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 2012 queen street e. toronto, ontario
  • 416-613-0256
  • beaches@thetenspot.com

Hours

mon. - fri: 9:00 am – 7:00 pm

sat. - sun: 9:00 am – 6:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

Antoinetta was amazing. She spent the time explaining each part of my facial and recommended products specific for my skin. No pressure sales tactics and she is very knowledgeable and totally down to earth. I have been practicing my new skincare... regime now for 4 days and already see an improvement. I'll be back! Friendly staff and very clean. Great vibe.read more
Lisa Tarnowsky
1720622615
I’d like to thank Antonietta’s for her wonderful service yesterday!She made me feel very comfortable during my service.She’s very friendly and she definitely knows what she’s doing.I definitely found the person that I will continue to keep going... back to!read more
Mariah Jeffers-Khan
1715961909
A big group of family all came for treatment for Mother's Day and the staff did extremely well servicing all of us. Some nice touches I haven't seen other places were the offer of drinks (coffee, tea, water), complementary toe wax, and the offer to... wrap our toes to protect the polish from our shoes before completely setting. I was thoroughly impressed with the service and quality. It made for a lovely day!read more
Jeanine Draper
1715539127
Antoinette, the esthetic expert applied the anti-aging facial for me today. It was relaxing and informative as she explained each product andpurpose step by step that was being used on my face. Antoinette is definitely well-trained and... knowledgeable. I noticed the difference in my face when finished. I highly recommend this facial and this location. Thank you to the friendly staff as well.read more
Deb Van Koughnett
1712444779
I'm usually very lazy to write reviews, but I wanted to take the time to write about how amazing this ten-spot location is! As a regular customer, the services never disappoint me! Everyone's so professional and good at their job. I have been to... multiple other locations, but this one is my favourite! I started getting the gel overlays, and I am absolutely loving it: my nails no longer break, they have grown so fast, and they look so good! Ashvina is my favourite. She is so sweet, and my nails always look natural and amazing!read more
Ekaterini Irini Vlashi
1710516453
Have been coming to this location for a little while and had my nails done by Roisin yesterday. She by far has been the best experience I’ve had, in an already solid track record of experiences.High quality service all round - worth the cost!
Sarah F
1707342281
I had an appointment with my friend for her birthday. There was a bit of a delay for one of us, however everyone was super nice and professional. Space is very nice, clean, good light and very good atmosphere to relax. I will go back.
Coco Bilan-Tracey
1706383114
I had an amazing facial done by Antonietta today. She was knowledgeable and took her time during the procedure. It was relaxing, and my skin looked amazing afterwards. I would highly recommend, and would definitely recommended booking with... Antonietta! 😊read more
Sam Sophia
1705184382
I LOVE coming to the Ten Spot and getting all my services done with Sam. She always goes above and beyond to make you feel comfortable and relaxed. For every service she provides she does an amazing job and takes her time. She always has a smile on... her face and is kind. The best part about having services done with Sam is that she makes you feel seen, heard and sends you home feeling like a Ten!read more
Manda Panda
1698536728
The staff are the best in the city. We took a friend for her birthday pedi and were treated with the best hospitality. The tubs and tools are fully sanitized and clean. I am a big fan of the Ten Spot!! Young and old can feel comfortable to access... this establishment.read more
Trevor Rodrigues
1659641306
‹
›
